resources.string: View centered in the top, and two View as shown in the middle
background color, and a Guidline that is used to align a TextView, Button and two Views as shown
ScrollView that contains a TextView. The TextView contains very long text (you must scroll to see all of it)
Guideline and a Horizontal ScrollView. This ScrollView contains many Buttons (you have to scroll to see them all).
Guideline, TextView and nested layout that contains a Button and ScrollView with many checkboxes (as shown).
